description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying an add-on license record.
Business-facing name of the add-on integration or feature associated with the license.
Concise functional summary of what the add-on enables or how it is used.
Unique license/activation token (typically a GUID) used to enable the add-on for a customer or installation.
Foreign key to a lookup defining the add-on’s category or type (e.g., integration, utility); likely reference data—confirm with SME.
